parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for forward direction, false for reverse

parameters.name: ReferenceType
parameters.description: Reference type as defined by swSelectionReferenceTypes_e

title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.GetEndConditionReference
description: Gets the reference entity defining the end condition in the forward or reverse direction.
signature:
System.Object GetEndConditionReference( 
   System.Boolean
Forward
,
   out System.Int32
ReferenceType
)

parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for forward direction, false for reverse

parameters.name: ReferenceType
parameters.description: Reference type as defined by swSelectionReferenceTypes_e

remarks:
